page.title: 11METROPOLE HOTEL
page.content: THE METROPOLE HOTEL IS SITUATED WITHIN THE N.E.C GROUNDS SERVING NOT ONLY THE N.E.C BUT ALSO THE BIRMINGHAM INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT. WITHIN MINUTES OF ARRIVAL AT BIRMINGHAM INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT YOU CAN EXPERIENCE THE COMFORT OF THE BIRMINGHAM METROPOLE HOTEL. THE BIRMINGHAM METROPOLE CONFERENCE CENTRE HAS SEVENTEEN LUXURY MEETING ROOMS,THE LARGEST HOUSING 1600 DELEGATES.A CINEMA WITH 200 TIERED SEATS IS ALSO AVAILABLE FOR FILM PRESENTATIONS. THE METROPOLE HOTEL ALSO OFFERS OUTSIDE CATERRING SERVICES FOR SHOWS AND EXHIBITIONS.
